name: SantaCountdown
0:
”Alexa, ask when will Santa be here?”
”Alexa, ask when will Santa arrive?”
”Alexa, ask when will Santa come?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: when will santa
des: Alexa has a direct line to the North Pole and knows when Santa will be paying a visit. Find out how long until he arrives!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
